LocationHeaderHelper: A header listing the selected location
SunlightHeaderHelper: A tab holding a table of daylight information
MoonlightHeaderHelper: A tab holding a table of moonlight information and moon phases
DailyHeaderHelper: A tab holding a table of daily weather information for a week
HourlyHeaderHelper: A tab holding a table of hourly weather information for the next few hours
DailyTableHelper: A table holding daily weather information for a few days
HourlyTableHelper: A table holding hourly weather information for the next few hours
SolarTableHelper: A table holding the current solar information for today
LunarTableHelper: A table holding the current lunar information and the next days a full moon or new moon will occur
AddLocationHeaderHelper: Header for the page, asking the user to add a new location.
BackButtonHelper: Button to go back to the previous page instead of submitting.
SubmitButtonHelper: Button to submit the form and go back to the previous page.
LocationAddFailedHelper: Dialog box alerting you that the location needs at minimum, the country to work with
LocationAddFailedText: The location could not be added because at a minimum, the country field is required.
DailyTemperatureChartHelper: Chart showing the high and low temperature for the day
HourlyTemperatureChartHelper: Chart showing the temperature and feel for the next few hours
DailyPopChartHelper: Chart showing the chance of rain for the next few days
HourlyPopChartHelper: Chart showing the chance of rain for the next few hours
DailyChartHeaderHelper: Tab showing chart data for the next few days
HourlyChartHeaderHelper: Tab showing chart data for the next few hours
RemoveHeader: Long Press to Remove Location (Can not remove current location)
